name: Weapon Sim For Fortnite
description:
If you like playing Fortnite you will fall in love with this Weapon Simulator!
Download Fortnite Weapon Simulator and you will get the simulations of the weapons from Fortnite Battle Royale - Pistols, Rifles, Submachine Guns, Miniguns, Shotguns, Snipers and Rocket Launchers!

- 20+ Different Weapons
- Original Sound Effects from Fortnite
- Weapon Reloading
- Regular Updates with a New Weapons
